resources.string:
<html>
			<head>
				<style>
					body
					{
						font-size: {fontsize}px;
						color: {fontcolor};
						text-align: left;
					}

					h1{font-size: {fontsizeh1}px; color: #35aad0;margin: 5px 0 0 0;}
					h2{font-size: {fontsizeh2}px; color: #286e85;margin: 0;padding: 2px 0 0 0;}
	
					ol, ul
					{
						margin: 0 0 0 15px;
						padding: 0 0 0 20px;
					}
					
					ol li, ul li
					{
						margin: 4px 0 2px ;
					}				
					
					.highlight, b, a{color: #079dd0;}		
					.green{color: #63c359;}			
					.red{color: #c31010;}					
					.nopadding{padding-top: 0;}
					.clear{clear: both;}
					
					.fleft{float: left;}
					.fright{float: right;}
					
					th
					{
						text-align: left;
						padding-right: 15px;
					}
					table
					{
						font-size: {fontsize}px;
					}

				</style>
			</head>
			<body>
				{content}	    
		    </body>
	    </html>
